atDirectives.name: @view-transition
atDirectives.description: In the case of a cross-document navigation, @view-transition is used to opt in the current and destination documents to undergo a view transition.

atDirectives.name: @scope
atDirectives.description: The @scope CSS at-rule enables you to select elements in specific DOM subtrees, targeting elements precisely without writing overly-specific selectors that are hard to override, and without coupling your selectors too tightly to the DOM structure.
